00020 
00021 #ifndef STRINGBUFFER_H_
00022 #define STRINGBUFFER_H_
00023 
00024 #include "Object.h"
00025 #include "Array.h"
00026 #include "Primitives.h"
00027 #include "String.h"
00028 
00029 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00030 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00031 typedef uint16_t uchar;
00032 
00033 class StringBuffer : public virtual Object {
00034 public:
00035     explicit StringBuffer(std::size_t len = 16) : buf(len), _length(0) {}
00036     StringBuffer(const String);
00037     virtual ~StringBuffer();
00038 
00039     size_t length() const;
00040     void deleteSubstring(idx_t start, idx_t end);
00041     void clear();
00042     const uchar& at(idx_t idx) const;
00043     uchar& at(idx_t idx);
00044 
00045     StringBuffer& operator<<(bool b);
00046     StringBuffer& operator<<(char c);
00047     StringBuffer& operator<<(Array<char> c);
00048     StringBuffer& operator<<(uchar c);
00049     StringBuffer& operator<<(Array<uchar> c);
00050     StringBuffer& operator<<(sint i);
00051     StringBuffer& operator<<(suint i);
00052     StringBuffer& operator<<(slong l);
00053     StringBuffer& operator<<(sulong l);
00054     StringBuffer& operator<<(float f);
00055     StringBuffer& operator<<(double d);
00056     StringBuffer& operator<<(String s);
00057     StringBuffer& operator<<(const char* s) {
00058         return operator<<(String(s));
00059     }
00060 
00061     template<class T>
00062     inline StringBuffer& operator+=(T t) {
00063         return operator<<(t);
00064     }
00065 
00066     String toString() const;
00067     operator String() const;
00068     
00069 private:
00070     Array<uchar> buf;
00071     size_t _length;
00072     void ensureCapacity(std::size_t capacity);
00073 };
00074 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00075 
00076 #endif  /* STRINGBUFFER_H_ */
00077
